metadata.title: CVE-2024-50167 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:be2net: fix potential memory leak in be_xmit()The be_xmit() returns NETDEV_TX_OK without freeing skbin case of be_xmit_enqueue() fails, add dev_kfree_skb_any() to fix it.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
